thread.title: Alleged Robber Planned Kim Kardashian Heist By Studying Her Social Media
thread.title_full: Alleged Robber Planned Kim Kardashian Heist By Studying Her Social Media

author: Rachel Vorona Cote
title: Alleged Robber Planned Kim Kardashian Heist By Studying Her Social Media
text:
Denzel Washington was genuinely surprised when he took home the SAG Award for Best Male Actor in a Leading Role instead of Casey Affleck . Advertisement Advertisement 
Check out this reaction GIF. It’s adorable. 
Affleck has so far prevailed in the category, most recently winning the Golden Globe. But now, perhaps, it would be unwise to assume that he will claim the Oscar as well. And honestly, I’m not the least bit mad about that. Fuck Casey Affleck. Advertisement 
[ Lainey Gossip ] 
Oh hey. Kylie Jenner went to Costa Rica and posted for a number of sultry bikini photos. The one below is really quite lovely. 
The Kardashian-Jenner clan is purportedly filming the next segment of their reality show on site. What a drag. Advertisement 
[ People ] After 18 years, David and Victoria Beckham renewed their marriage vows. David also harbors some regrets regarding the marching purple ensembles he and V donned at their wedding. [ Us Weekly ] New couple Selena Gomez and The Weeknd are traveling around Italy, and they apparently don’t want people to notice them. [ TMZ ] Just so you know: Olivia Munn and Aaron Rodgers are not engaged. [ People ] Stassi Schroeder has opinions about Scheana Marie and Mike Shay . [ Us Weekly ] Paris Jackson wants to be a star, and she’ll have her shot when she appears on... Star (the Empire spinoff). [ TMZ ] The assault case against Lloyd Klein , former romantic partner to Jocelyn “Catwoman” Wildenstein , has been dropped. [ Page Six ] Anthony Anderson and Alvina Stewart decided not to get divorced, and then they attended the SAG Awards. [ Us Weekly ]
